verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> against the Philistines <WH6430>, before that Pharaoh <WH6547> struck <WH5221> Gaza <WH5804>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; Behold <WH4325>, waters rise up <WH5927> out of the north <WH6828>, and shall be a overflowing <WH7857> flood <WH5158>, and shall overflow <WH7857> the land <WH776>, and all that is in it <WH4393>; the city <WH5892>, and them that live <WH3427> in it <WH120>: then the men shall cry <WH2199>, and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> shall howl <WH3213>.

At the noise <WH6963> of the stamping <WH8161> of the hoofs <WH6541> of his strong <WH47> horses <WH7494>, at the rushing of his chariots <WH7393>, and at the rumbling <WH1995> of his wheels <WH1534>, the fathers <WH1> shall not look back <WH6437> to their sons <WH1121> for feebleness <WH7510> of hands <WH3027>;

Because of the day <WH3117> that comes <WH935> to plunder <WH7703> all the Philistines <WH6430>, and to cut off <WH3772> from Tyrus <WH6865> and Zidon <WH6721> every helper <WH5826> that remains <WH8300>: for the Lord <WH3068> will plunder <WH7703> the Philistines <WH6430>, the remnant <WH7611> of the country <WH339> of Caphtor <WH3731>.
Baldness <WH7144> is come <WH935> upon Gaza <WH5804>; Ashkelon <WH831> is cut off <WH1820> with the remnant <WH7611> of their valley <WH6010>: how long will you cut yourself <WH1413>?

O <WH1945> you sword <WH2719> of the Lord <WH3068>, how long will it be before <WH3808> you be quiet <WH8252>? put up <WH622> yourself into your scabbard <WH8593>, rest <WH7280>, and be still <WH1826>.
How can it be quiet <WH8252>, seeing the Lord <WH3068> has given it a charge <WH6680> against Ashkelon <WH831>, and against the sea <WH3220> shore <WH2348>? there has he appointed it <WH3259>.
